overview: In this 'sequel' anthology, the film offers a TRANCERS sequel written by original creators Danny Bilson and Paul DeMeo, a new Lovecraft adaptation THE EVIL CLERGYMAN, featuring Jeffrey Combs and Barbara Crampton, and finally a sequel to THE DUNGEONMASTER.
tagline: Three heart stopping tales in one film. Three new dimensions in terror, treachery and time travel.
title: Pulse Pounders
